snippet: A four-month strategic review offered several proposals for how the military can be smarter as it is forced by budget cuts to be smaller.
abstract: Washington Memo; four-month strategic review of Defense Department, ordered by Defense Sec Chuck Hagel, offers several proposals for how military can be smarter as it is forced by budget cuts to be smaller; there is no consensus on what treatment is best--or what is affordable.
lead_paragraph: A four-month strategic review offered several proposals for how the military can be smarter as it is forced by budget cuts to be smaller.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
